title: Taking statins for heart disease cuts risk in half, yet only 6 percent of patients taking as directed

title_detail.value: Taking statins for heart disease cuts risk in half, yet only 6 percent of patients taking as directed

summary: A new study finds that taking statins for heart disease cuts risk of second serious event in half, yet only 6 percent of patients are following as directed.

summary_detail.value: A new study finds that taking statins for heart disease cuts risk of second serious event in half, yet only 6 percent of patients are following as directed.
